step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Make sure to exhale and relax your muscles as you do this.
Continue to focus on opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles during this step.
Keep up the good work with the outward arm movement. Ensure you are exhaling and relaxing your muscles as you extend.
You're completing the repetitions nicely. Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles as you extend your arms.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Keep focusing on opening your fingers and extending your arms while exhaling and relaxing. This helps promote lymph drainage effectively.
